name: ULTRAHORSE Market
subtitle: A home for games built for gamers and traders.
description: ULTRAHORSE hosts games that provide pure tactile fun and extend it with novel trading features. Visit us at https://squadblast.com

apps.localizedDescription:
- RedditFilter & RedditSideloadFix are made by u/level3tjg!!!
- Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings.
- Requires iOS 14.0 or later.
- Source code: 
https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditFilter
https://github.com/level3tjg/RedditSideloadFix
apps.name: RedditFilter
apps.subtitle: Filter out unwanted content from your Reddit feed. Configurable from in-app settings

apps.localizedDescription:
Rocket not only gives you the features that are missing from Instagram, but it also gives you full control over the app.

Learn how to make your own Rocket for Instagram iPA here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/IGSideloadFix

FEATURES
- Browse home feed in grid layout.
- Show following status in Profile.
- Download posts from your feed.
- Repost any post from your feed.
- Long press on posts to zoom.
- Copy post captions from your feed.
- Download all Stories on Instagram.
- Save videos from IGTV.
- View Stories without notifying others.
- Mute and unmute Stories.
- Disable Auto-Advance in Stories.
- Hide Stories from your feed.
- Play in high quality on Mobile Data.
- Long press on profile photo to zoom.
- Disable read receipts in DM.
- Disable Screenshot notifications in DM.
- Disable Read Receipts in DM.

Learn how to make your own Rocket for Instagram iPA here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/IGSideloadFix
apps.name: Rocket for Instagram
apps.subtitle: Save posts and view stories anonymously and do much more. Requires iOS 12.4 and later.

apps.localizedDescription:
uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with some extra features! (requires iOS 14.0 and later).

Full infomation about uYouPlus (uYou+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up uYouPlus! 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#credits

Attention:
- If you like the app, considering support the developers!
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work.

Known issues:
- uYou's issues: https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube/issues
- uYouPlus's issues: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus
apps.name: uYouPlus (uYou+)
apps.subtitle: A modified version of uYou with extra features! Requires iOS 14.0 and later.
apps.versionDescription:
v19.08.2 (3.0.3): The changelog can be found at
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/releases/tag/latest

news.title: Introducing SquadBlast!
news.caption: The time has come - a timeless multiplayer run'n'gun available for everyone! Check out the latest news below.

news.title: SquadBlast Store is now open!
news.caption: Our Store provides daily free rewards, a permanent 5% discount on purchases and exclusive offers not found anywhere else!

news.title: Sneak Peek - Next Update Preview
news.caption: Next update is right around the corner! Check out the preview of a new game mode, new healing grenade and more!

news.title: Play SquadBlast via Cloud!
news.caption: Looking for a quick way for your friends to experience SquadBlast? Share a link to Cloud version that lets anyone to try the game in just a few seconds!

news.title: ULTRAHORSE Market open for business
news.caption: ULTRAHORSE Market now accepts arsenal from SquadBlast: buy, sell & trade weapons now! Expect hat trading to be available later in 2024.

news.title: Tournament in full swing
news.caption: Season 8 Leaderboard tournament has just started! Master your side-scroller gunplay and reach the top for amazing rewards.

news.title: Join SquadBlast Discord!
news.caption: Join Squadblast bustling community. Find friends and arrange parties for best results. Chat with devs and find sneak peeks of upcoming features!

news.title: Ultra-Verse
news.caption: Explore the grand universe of our world in 2041. Future is closer than you think and you will shape the events of things to come.

news.title: Workshop
news.caption: Latest update added ability to craft cosmetic items and even new weapons. Craft anything you imagine!

news.title: Summer Games are here!
news.caption: Dont settle for breaking temperature reccords, participate in SquadBlast Summer games preview mode - Speedrun! Cool off in style against your friends.

news.title: Follow us!
news.caption: Follow us on your favourite socials and never miss an importaint update.
